full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Grid-Integration and other Installation Costs Study of Medium and Heavy Duty Vehicle Electric Vehicle Chargers

**Tender Reference:** cb-116-56800245  
**Amendment:** 7  
**Solicitation Number:** T8080-230381  
**Publication Date:** November 22, 2023  
**Tender Closing Date:** December 22, 2023, 14:00:00  
**Amendment Date:** January 4, 2024  
**Expected Contract Start and End Dates:** 
 * N/A  
**Tender Status:** Expired  
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal  
**GSIN (Goods and Services Identification Number):** None  
**UNSPSC (United Nations Standard Products and Services Code):** 
 * 25170000 - Transportation components and systems  
 * 25190000 - Transportation services equipment

## Project Details

The purpose of this tender is to receive proposals for a Grid-Integration and other installation costs study of medium and heavy-duty Electric Vehicle (EV) chargers. This project will investigate the costs associated with integrating EV chargers into the grid, including labour, site redesigns, and permitting.

## Contract Details

The contract is expected to commence on contract award and conclude on September 1, 2024.

## Scope of Work

**Applicable Trade Agreements**
The project is subject to various free trade agreements, including, but not limited to:

 * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)  
 * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)  
 * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement  
 * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)  
 * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement  
 * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement  
 * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Bidder Requirements

Teams must demonstrate the ability to provide a comprehensive analysis of the costs associated with EV charger integration, including the costs of labour, site redesigns, and permitting.

## Selection Criteria

The selection process will be based on a combined evaluation of the bidder's technical merit and price.

## Bidder Contact
Interested bidders can contact Louise Curtis, Procurement Specialist, Transport Canada at [Meranda.hodgson@tc.gc.ca](mailto:Meranda.hodgson@tc.gc.ca)  or (343) 571-8834.

## Tender Documents
Tender documents are available on the Canada Buy website. [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/
